website_summaries.verdict: Simple yet stylish, this flattering solid color tunic is easy to dress up or down.
pros: Solid color makes this piece versatile
Flowy handkerchief hem flatters the torso and wider hips
Slimmer fit at shoulders and arms
cons: Some customers report holes in the seams
While it can be machine washed, the manufacturer recommends washing it by hand

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt and good price. I think the white is a little dingy. I think the fit is as expected. The sleeves are a little tight. I got a xl. I wear a 14/16 and 18/20 from lane bryant. I'm 5'7 250lbs. 42ddd. I wear a large perfect tee from lularoe for a size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this top! I'm 5'8" and about 140-145 lbs. I get medium tops more often than not, and sometimes will even go for a large if I want a top to be long enough to wear with leggings. For this shirt, however, I read the reviews and decided to go with a small in 'Steel Blue'. The small is perfect! It's still very roomy yet it doesn't look like a giant bag draped over me. It also passes the butt-covering test, which is a complete win for us tall girls! I will be wearing this with leggings and have already ordered it in more colors. So much better than some other brands of tunics listed on here!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy top in pretty pink color
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up since it is a clingy fabric & fits perfect. Long enough to cover hips/ buttocks & wear with leggings. Some gals may wear as a dress (& I may in the summer) but I wear it as a top with leggings. I am 5'5 so it is plenty long for my height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, comfortable and flattering shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love these shirts with leggings! I have 5 different short sleeve ones, and 3 long sleeve. They are SUPER comfy, and I feel like they are pretty flattering. They hug where they should and are nice and flowy where they should be hiding certain areas. They work great with layering for the winter and very cool during the summer. I'm a stay at home mom, so I'm usually in my lularoe leggings and one of these shirts. Comfy but cute! I do think it runs a tad big, but due to the cut and material, there is wiggle room either way on sizing and so they still wear perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LeahJA

customer_reviews.title: Great for leggings
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and bought a size down - it first perfectly and is super comfy. In fact, I probably could have gone 2 sizes down and still been OK. This pairs nicely with a couple of LuLaRoe leggings I have. I ended up buying it in 2 more colors!
customer_reviews.author: B.B

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red. The color is very nice and the material is very soft. However it fits like an oversized stretched out t-shirt. It's clingybut where the pictures show pleats and flares its just flat. It looks terrible. From reading the inconsistent reviews I'm wondering if several companies are filling these orders.
customer_reviews.author: Sirka

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so soft and comfy and looks great with leggings. I ordered the white and it is VERY sheer. I have to wear a cami under it, but I would buy this again in darker colors. I'm 5'5, 128 and bought the small which isa little big in the width, but overall I'm happy with the purchase. It also shipped very fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Hokie Pants

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. It's a great color. It fits nice. I plan on ordering it in more colors soon. After washing and wearing it twice, I've noticed some problems. One side in the front is "pelling" and one of the arms has came unsewed. I'm really disappointed in the quality of it because it looked so great. ☹
customer_reviews.author: Missie L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of this top is extremely thin and really requires an additional top under it unless you're wanting to show off your undies. I guess I didn't realize I had to hand wash but that's a definite turn-off for me. It runs very large and therefore almost swallows me which may or may not be my fault. I'll never buy another and will only wear this at home. It was cheap and that's what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Judi L. Faulk

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful shirt. I hate buying clothing online
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful shirt. I hate buying clothing online, but being disabled I don't have much choice. This I intend to buy in every color available. It fits perfectly. the length is correct and the color is a deep, but bright and cheerful red. The fabric is what really won me over. It is SUPER soft and stretchable and breathable. So very nice for summer or fall - you wont be too hot in it. This shirt is well made and has nice seam work and there are no snags or flaws. I would and have recommended my friends buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Glinskie

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lularoe
customer_reviews.text: Better than Lularoe! I have an Irma top from Lularoe and like these so much better! Theyre more comfortable and cover better. I wear a 3x from pretty much anywhere and bought a 3x and it fits perfectly! I'm a size 24/26... I carry most of my weight in my midsection and these are amazing! So comfy and flattering! If you typically wear a 3x or maybe even a 4x, these will fit you. The only issue might be if you're tall... I'm only 5'5". I'm never wearing anything other than these and Lula leggings for the rest of my life! About to order ever color!
customer_reviews.author: colemank19

customer_reviews.title: fits well and is very comfortable. I ordered white and was impressed that the ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is gorgeous, fits well and is very comfortable. I ordered white and was impressed that the material wasn't too thin. The fabric is very soft with a bit of bounce to the material. I would say it's true to size or somewhat big. Definitely don't size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going to wear as a maternity top! Feels great😍
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10", 190 lbs and i have a long torso (i also happen to be 21 weeks pregnant) i bought a couple shirts like these bc i wanted to wear them as maternity shirts. I ordered these in a large and they fit perfectly. Sorry i took pics with them straight out of the bag so they are wrinkled. But they feel so soft and i thought they looked really nice!! Only down side is they are supposed to be handwashed and sun dried... who has time for that 😑?
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too clingy and shows all my fat. If I were to keep this top, I’d definitely need to wear Spanx underneath to hold everything in. Not for chubby girls like me. However, the red color is pretty and bright. It’s a lightweight top and really cute. Perfect for summer and has nice coverage for those who would pair it with leggings. I’ll be sending the top back, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Show Me MO

customer_reviews.title: Hoped it would be good...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fabric is very soft and comes out of the dryer without need to iron Cons: runs small (probably fine if you have no boobs), fabric is extremely thin- not something I'd wear out of the house. I can literally see the color of my fingers when I hold the fabric against my hands.
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tunics! I'm 5'11 and these fit great on me. Cover my butt to wear with jeggings and they hide my mom gutt! Fit as expected UPDATE: I now have 5 of these. So comfy and versatile. Can wear with jeans or work clothes (business casual). Buy it, buy it, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Color Tunic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this top & fits just the way I wanted. I'm 5'4", 200 lbs., & ordered an XL, which is what I normally wear. Material is soft & the fit is great....loose & flowy all over & length is mid thigh on me, so looks good with leggings & hides the lower tummy bulge I have. Glad I didn't order a bigger size...it would have been way too big. Now that I know the size & fit of this top, am going to order a couple more in different colors. Very pleased with my purchase, was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy, Memphis, TN (USA)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful top but material could be a problem
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail today. It fits perfectly!!! The only reason I am not giving it a 5 star is because it is 95% Rayon material which I didn't pay attention to when purchasing. So this top needs to be handwashed or washed in the machine on delicate cold cycle according to the tag. I am hopeful that it won't shrink assuming that I wash it according to the tag because this really is a wonderfully fitting top. I have a big butt and a round tummy so this is a very flattering top for my body figure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear XL as I don’t like my tops too tight but can do Large depending the brand. When buying online from random brands it’s always hard to gauge if you should buy your size. I read a few different reviews before purchasing. I bought the XL and love the fit. Overall I’d say true to size. Fit at chest was just right, not too tight at all. The white is slightly see through but no big deal. I’ll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Cknels

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have noticed this before I washed it. On the back of the top, there was a substance that was like inky splotches (about 5 different spots) that soaked in from the top of surface and underneath the surface. I sure can't wear this now and will have to throw it away. Be sure to examine it carefully before you wear it so you don't have the same outcome that I did.
customer_reviews.author: L. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: REALLY small SIZED but feels so silky soft!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the sizing. I wear a 4X and with this sizing, I'd need a 7x - dang, that's scary to even look at in writing. BUT the up side is the fabric is silky soft and just a luxury to have next to your body (as it shows every bump and bulge in your physique - of course, you bumps and bulges may be put together to be dynamite while mine looks like the giant marshmallow boy on Ghost Busters.) I may just keep it to sleep in because it sure is soft!
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna

customer_reviews.title: Fits in all the right places
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2 and size 2X. This shirt covers my lower stomach and is flattering in shape. I have thick upper arms and it fits them nicely as well. It does wrinkle easily if not pulled out of the dryer right away and hung up. I will by more. Oh, the color is true.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Warren

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE, Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer of this item is MOA. The fabric is very nice! -Just enough to cover up your rear end, but not so much that it looks like a tent! The only drawback is that this top runs approximately one-two sizes small. If you regularly wear a 2X 18/20, you will have to purchase a 3X or 4X. The great thing is that Amazon Prime has the option to easily exchange it if you need a different size. Just be sure that it is sold AND fulfilled by Amazon for easy no hassle returns. I think you'll be really happy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Every color needed now.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this top. I was a little worried that the white would be see-through, but there are no issues. The fabric is really soft. I'm 5 feet tall and 100 pounds, and I ordered the top in a size small. It fits perfectly. I'm online now to order more colors. I would 100% recommend this top
customer_reviews.author: JBRN

customer_reviews.title: Nice t shirts, but very lightweight fabric
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these t shirts in black last fall/winter and it was a slightly heavier fabric and draped so nicely with such a flattering fit. First time I wore it, my teenage daughter said "You look slim, mom." That sold me on getting another in different colors! But when my grey/green and brown ones arrived just now, I see the fabric is much lighter and they don't hang as nicely as my black one from earlier. For summer, I guess it makes sense for them to be lighter-weight, but I'm disappointed. Not the same effect. I'll keep them because they're wardrobe staples, but...
customer_reviews.author: flikwrtr

customer_reviews.title: I can even wear it for a nightie!
customer_reviews.text: I can even wear it for nightie. A couple of years ago I found 2 nighties with this handkerchief hem. They are so pretty that they look like summer dresses and I can get up and take the dog out and put her in the garden in my nighty and everyone thinks I’m in a little summer dress. The length of this top covers private areas when I wear leggings, and I liked it a lot. Also, the Room In is of it over the leggings creates an all-around slimming look.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size, bizarre and very unflattering fit.
customer_reviews.text: WAY small....ordered 3XL and it is at best comparable to an XL. The material is soft and the style/hemline has a good swing to it but across the chest and shoulders this top is like wearing a tight fitting t-shirt. Also, the sleeves are extremely short and tight as well. It's as if the top half of the shirt was designed for a thin person and the bottom half thoughtfully designed for a heavier person. I will be sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Day-oh

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tunic!! Loose fit & long
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tunic. Long enough to cover rump and belly for us girls that like those areas covered. I wear it with my Lularoe leggings and everyone asks me if it is a Lularoe shirt. Of course it isn't , but fits better and feels just as nice!!!! I can only wear the IRMA Lularoe shirt and trust me, I have tried them all and even went up in size trying to get a fit. No more....now I found this shirt, I will buy in other colors to match my leggings. I highly recommend this shirt if you like loose fit tunics!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful top!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful top. I have it in multiple colors and wear with my print palazzo pants and other bottoms. The fabric is beautiful and washes well. The top is heavy enough that it's not see through, but light enough for summer. I ordered an XL. I wear size XL or 1X in tops and it fits fine. I probably could wear in a L but the XL works. It's really a nice top and I would expect it to cost more.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great Women’s Top
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love, this women’s top❤️ Looks great, fits true to size, consistent fit & quality, order to order. They wash well & dry with very few wrinkles. Colors stay vibrant. If you are looking for cool & comfortable clothing for summer or anytime, then look no further. I now own this top in a variety of colors for leggings & shorts! I have purchased six, so far. 😁Look forward to buying more. Shipping was quick with Amazon, item arrives, packaged nicely! 😊 One of my best purchases to date❣️
customer_reviews.author: Kra-Z-Kat

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to order for the fit you want
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and brought my top in a 3x when I wear a 2x. I wanted the shirt to have a loose flow feel as well as not strangle my boobs, and with the upsize it did just that. I'm normal height for a women and it stops just at my hips. The material falls right off the body and doesn't show off my food bump. It washes well, I do not dry it in the dryer, I lay it flat to dry on towels and then hang it. I also haven't used an iron, cause it is not cotton, but some kind of blend. So out of fear of it burning, I keep all heat off it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Love the neckline, love the fabric, love the length! I wish this brand made long sleeves!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: I have literally a few dozen LARACE tunic tops ...
customer_reviews.text: I have (literally) a few dozen LARACE tunic tops in different (solid) colors, most with 3/4 sleeves (which hit my short arms an inch or so above my wrist bone) and some with short sleeves. I just bought a few more with short sleeves in print fabrics that I also love. I usually wear a L in tops and that is what I order in LARACE. They fit perfectly. They are super comfortable and cover all the stuff that I (a short-but-not-slight woman) want covered. I LOVE LARACE!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Sakamoto

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, and I am short enough to wear them as dresses, so I will be ordering many more! The colors are lucious, the fit is comfy, the cut is flattering, the material is soft and light weight....everything I was looking for. I have many beautiful short, kimono-like dusters that creates an outfit out of a simple dress. Could be used as a great night shirt, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hole in Shirt
customer_reviews.text: At first I was excited to see that my shirt had arrived on time and seemed to fit pretty well (it is on the looser side, but I do prefer my clothes to be not tight), but to my great disappointment I had found a hole on the right shoulder seam. As you can see in the pictures I provided, the shirt wasn't even sewn together at this part. I will be returning this and hopefully my next order will not be damaged like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pham

customer_reviews.title: Flowing and cute but too thin
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to receive it and see it was large, flowing, and long enough for the leggings I wanted to wear it with. However, it was thin enough to be see-through, at least in white. Also, after wearing it a couple of times , I saw it had developed a noticeable imperfection right in front.It appears the fabric was scratched or snagged, not enough to make a rip but it's ugly enough that I'm downgrading it to exercise clothes. I blame the thin fabric. I did follow all the washing instructions and can't remember catching it on anything. I'm holding it in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for maternity & post-partum!
customer_reviews.text: I needed loose fitting clothes because in my 3rd trimester I couldn't find tops that would cover my belly I am normally a medium and I would be wearing XL top and it would still be short or look ridiculous. Maternity clothes are so overpriced too. This top is great because it's really long, really flowy and I love the pink color. It hides my post-partum belly perfectly and I feel great in it. I highly recommend this top for Mamas or anyone looking for oversized or long flowy tops.
customer_reviews.author: IShopAlotonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt! I did order it 1 size larger then I normally wear because of the pics I seen on here and how it fit other woman. I am larger in the bust area and it is always hard to find a good fitting shirt. I am also 5'8 and the length on this was perfect. Came just below my butt! I will be ordering more in the future. Maybe even some long sleeve ones. I suggest before ordering, look at the pics and read the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.C

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall heavy people
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and shorter than shown. If you are over 5’ 5” I doubt it will be the legend here shown. It’s okIF you don’t want long to your hips. Material is soft and colors bright. Sleeves tight and too short for my liking. Others may find it acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt! Long and soft. After reading reviews I got a large for extra room as my pregnant belly grows. Around the shoulders it fits more like a medium. But it fits like a large around the tummy and in its length (which works out great for me). It's very stretchy material. I wear it with leggings and it easily covers my bottom (I'm 5' 7" and 135 lbs with a little baby bump.. it covered my sisters bottom too and she's 5' 9" and slim). Hope that helps. I would recommend and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: mbaker154

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: This top is pretty cute, but it is just not very good quality. The first one I ordered got a hole during the first wash (I don't even have a washing machine with an agitator). I was able to return it and get a replacement. The 2nd one I received got a weird stain and small hole on day one. I literally work from home, and I don't wear this top to anything aggressive. None of my other tops ever get holes or stains. I think it is just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Hand Wash, Line Dry
customer_reviews.text: These are hand wash only, line dry--just FYI. They are made with Rayon and Spandex. It is super soft, comfy, true to color, and fits well (I'd say true to size). I won't wear this with leggings though because it does not cover all of my butt and thighs. I do like the first one a lot though so I will be buying it in more colors. And with long sleeves! But the thinness of the shirt means I won't be able to wear them in cold weather. Oh an, make sure your undergarments are padded so you don't show *ahem* too much!
customer_reviews.author: 1HotMamma

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable; Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancee for Christmas. It fits her very nice. She loves it. Fabric is soft and stretchy. It hugs her curves nicely and the length is perfect for wearing with her leggings. The only "con" she has given this top are that the arms are tight. However with a jacket or cardigan she says it isn't a big deal. She wants to get more in other colors. Size up. This top is fitting up top and flowy down at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: NICE TOP!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9", 160 pounds, 38C and the LARGE fits me very well. It's a bit roomer than I expected, but doesn't pull across the bust, AND it "falls" beautifully, so it looks good. I think the Medium would have been too tight across the chest. The material is very nice... lightweight but not too thin and NOT clingy! I haven't worn or washed it yet, but I have other Larace tops and they've washed well. Just hang them up on a padded hangar to dry.
customer_reviews.author: PCAT

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for skinny jeans
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this top it smelled like perfume and had an oil stain on it. I washed it 2 times trying to get it smelling good and the stain off. I returned that one and get another one of the same. It fits perfect and smells like it should. It's very soft and it is the perfect length for leggings or skinny jeans. I'm 230 lbs and 5 foot 4 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a touch small but great top.
customer_reviews.text: Color was very saturated and vibrant, material was soft and lightweight & breathable. I like to swim in my clothes, I am glad I ordered a size up because it ran small in the bust and really small in the arms. Also it could be me as I get most of my length in my torso but this top isnt as long as I normally go for tunic tops. I wont be just wearing it with leggings, it doesn't quite flow past a point where it would be decent. But it goes nicely with a cute skirt or jeans. I will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Moobchild

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this top...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the material has majors flaws, which makes it unwearable. That's too bad because it fits well and looks really nice. One of the flaws runs across the front of the shirt at an angle and is about an inch and half wide by 6 inches long. The flaw on the back is just as long, but only an 1/8" wide, so it's not as noticeable. Pros: Great fit Comfortable Looks good Cons: TERRIBLE fabric
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Hhhmmm
customer_reviews.text: It was well packaged when I received it . I've only work it once because it is a but bit of a heavy material and tends to pull down due to it which cause your bra lining to be able to be much more visible. The material is soft however. I don't know if I'll ever wear it again due to these issues I personally was having so that part does bum me out. For that I give it a lower rating . Slightly heavier then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Tunics are new closet staple
customer_reviews.text: These tunics are my new go-to garment. I bought five, a couple for myself and for gifts, in several colors. I may get more! The price is right, I got most of them on sale. The fit is fine, the solid colors are great for layering and accessorizing. The tunics are made to fit loosely and they do flow nicely. The tunic is quite comfortable and soft to the touch. My only wish is that the fabric was a little thicker. It is similar to a t shirt that you have washed several times. I am glad that the colors I chose are the darker ones. I can wear mine without a chemise, lighter ones may need an under layer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Morris Shipley

customer_reviews.title: It fits like a 2x
customer_reviews.text: Because of other reviews I ordered a size larger than I needed. I am approximately a size 20 and ordered 3x. It fits like a 2x. I have ordered a few tunic top on Amazon in the past few months and so far it is my favorite. I ordered the Olive Green and I love it. The color is fantastic! It hangs long enough that I feel comfortable wearing leggings with it. It cover the behind perfectly. The reason that I like this top more than the others that I have purchased is the sleeves. The leangth of the sleeves is perfect. I am definitely going to purchase more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful turquoise color.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fit as expected, get your typical size. I did hand wash this as per the directions and the color did not bleed. I think it should be fine to wash with my other shirts in the washing machine on the delicate cycle. I would not try to dry this in the dryer as it dries by line very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Family of four

customer_reviews.title: Big girls, Rejoice!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I could NOT pass up the chance on this! I purchased the pink and immediately loved the loose comfortable fit. I wasn't prepared for the barrage of compliments when I went to work! Literally everywhere I went people were complimenting me on my top and asking me where I got it. I am 5'8 and 200lb and bought the 2 XL and it fit perfectly! Not too tight on my DD chest, loose and flowy around waist and butt and very flattering cut. I have ordered 2 more in additional colours. I wish they had patterned ones as well. Anyway, this is a super slimming and extra comfortable top!! Lots of stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great color selection
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 of these tops in different colors (sleet blue, blueish purple, purple, and lake blue) as my workplace has recently approved these to wear in place of the hotel standard tops that cost nearly 2.5x as much ($45-55 on average and we only receive 1-2 depending on part/full-time status). They are super comfortable, soft, and they fit super well. I now spend my shifts much more comfortable than in the stuffy uniforms that we wore before. My only complaint would be that due to the material, they are easy to stain, but with the right treatment the stains come out pretty easily. So as long as you're careful, it's 115% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tunic!
customer_reviews.text: I love to wear tunics and legggings, and have ordered numerous tunics from Amazon. These are by far my favorite. I'm 36DD, and normally wear a med or lg in tops. I ordered the Lg, and the fit is perfect! The length covers my butt well. The fabric is better quality than others I have received from other vendors on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as I expected, but loved it when I wore it
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my post because I'm in love! I was not too thrilled when I first got it. The shirt is a little see through. And I ordered a 1X but got an XL. I went back in and looked and noticed XL wasn't even an option. I did wear a tank underneath. But OMG! I put it on and it wore it. It was soft like LuLaRoe and fit better than my Irmas or Classic T's. It's flowy, but not like a maternity shirt or anything like that. It's cut perfectly and is long enough to cover my front and rear so it works beautifully for leggings. I'm going to order more!
customer_reviews.author: kstock

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple and it was true to color. The top fit just like I wanted it too, loose and flowing. I wish the length was a little longer, but still good to wear with leggings. I liked it so much, that I ordered a couple more in different colors to go with leggings. It held up good in the wash and dried vitually wrinkle free on the hanger. The material is stretchy but not enough that it stretches to the point that you can see through it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable, fits great, and light weight. It is long enough to cover bulges yet not unflattering in style. I highly recommend it. The one thing I do not like about it , it is slit to a V in back which shows bare skin if not wearing a chemise or something under it.
customer_reviews.author: LAWonder10

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Item. I ordered a larger size than normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Item. I ordered a larger size than normal to be sure I would fir looser. Material is very soft and top fits nicely but does have a clingly feel, however it does flatter my body shape. Length is good, works well with leggings. Color is nice and rich...very pretty blue as shown. I like the style of these tops...they are my favorite. Plan to buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Terre

customer_reviews.title: Great top!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always reluctant to buy clothes off of Amazon- no offense to Amazon. But I really like these tops! I’ve gotten multiple different colors. Soft, flows well, great value to wear with leggings. I’m 5’2” and it hits my mid thigh and covers the rear. Just the way I like it
customer_reviews.author: KansasKim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty shirt, but is too snug without a jacket or vest to help cover. It's clingy. I bought one size larger than usual because I was afraid the material might be more snug. I was right, but probably should have bought a 4X or 5X to get the fit. The sleeves are also too short and tight. I dont' like clothes sticking to me and this shirt does just that.
customer_reviews.author: Ilsa

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and fit.  Not enough cotton fiber.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color. Fits nicely and looks good with leggings or even Capri length leggings. For me, very uncomfortable to wear in hot weather due it not being mostly cotton. Should have read more detail information. Did wash nicely. May try again...in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lady

customer_reviews.title: These shirts are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and liked it so much I bought 2 more. They fit well and they are very light and comfy. Easy care for laundry. I like loose clothes as I am larger so I hate tight things. These are stylish yet loose enough to hide parts I want. I wear a 22-24 and bought a 4x. Fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits loose
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’6” and 170 lbs; I purchased a medium thinking it would be a little snug... I am in the process of losing weight. I love the shirt but they do fit larger than I expected and I am by no means a medium right now. However, it does hide any roll I have at the moment. I do recommend... just realize these are loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-pregnancy and during! I bought 3
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are so comfortable. The material is breathable, and just the right thickness (doesn't expose my bra, but still thin). They are stylish and nice enough that I can wear them to my business casual job. Pre-pregnancy, I was 38 bust, and bought size large. Now I'm five months pregnant and bought 2 more, same size! Great to have shirts that work in both scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: md18

customer_reviews.title: Probably would make a good maternity top
customer_reviews.text: Probably would make a GREAT maternity top, but if you’re not pregnant, it sure as heck will make you look like you are, especially if you are larger-chested. I was the latter, which is why I gave it 3 stars. However, this would probably be a five-star shirt for anyone expecting a baby. It’s so roomy and flowy you could probably wear this one shirt all nine months.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: too short
customer_reviews.text: This says it is 33 inches long. Definitely not. It is too short to wear with leggings. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady

customer_reviews.title: A perfect top for leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Love this top. It's my second one and I have a third on the way. They are absolutely perfect for wearingnwith leggings (which is what I bought them for). They cover the bum and wider parts of the thighs making me feel comfortable and trendy. I recommend these tops. A+
customer_reviews.author: Kelcarm

customer_reviews.title: For the price - I would say it is pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: 5'5" 140 lb size 10-12. size 36 c. Ordered medium based on reviews. Wish I had ordered a large as I like looser fit. I purchase on of these shirts in long sleeve prior. This one is nothing like that. thinner, ran much smaller, I am NOT a short person and I can wear this as a dress. Front of package labelled XL, back of package labelled medium (which is what it actually was.) Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Higby

customer_reviews.title: This shirt is so pretty! Love the color and the cut- so soft ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so pretty! Love the color and the cut- so soft and just all around amazing! I've washed/worn a few times and it still looks and feels brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki K.

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good!
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a 2x but ordered a 4x and it’s a little large. But I wanted it to be more flouncy so as not to show every lump or bump under it! I get a lot of complements on this. I bought 3 colors! My go to tops! So reasonably priced. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: "Kahului Shopper" Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Bad Seams
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Purchased this and after the first wear the stitching on the bottom seam has come out. I would return it, but the Amazon window has closed so I can't. Look closely at garment when you get it (instead of putting it away and realizing there's a problem when you first go to wear it!).
customer_reviews.author: jpeng

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this top. So happy that I ordered another in the deep green. It fits perfect. I was afraid because usually a large is a bit small and XL is to big. But the large fit so good and it feels so good on. My hubby loved the color too. So did I and I can't wait to get the green one as green is my favorite color. If you order the correct size you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt! Good color and fit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this shirt! Color is great. I have this shirt in several different colors. It is long enough to wear over leggings. I typically buy a 3x or 4x off the rack, but opted for the 5x in this shirt...glad I did. It is perfect fit. Shirt is not too thin. Material is good weight.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1212

customer_reviews.title: Awesome top!
customer_reviews.text: I love this top! It is soft, flowing and doesn't cling. I bought the navy and wear it with my white capris.. so summery and I love the cut of the hem! I will be ordering a couple more colors. I normally wear a 2x and I ordered a 2x. It fits the way I like.. but if you like things a bit snug you might want to go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Color off
customer_reviews.text: I should have gone down a size. I bought 3x. I am 5'3 and 265 pounds. I kept it. I bought the blue one. I was a bit disappointed that it wasn't the blue in the picture but more of a dull slate blue. Very comfy. Soft. Flowy. Covers the butt, hips, and belly nicely without looking like you are wearing an oversized bag. Great with leggings. No issue with quality. Have worn it many times.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: but flows nicely. It's a little too short for my comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin, but flows nicely. It's a little too short for my comfort to wear with leggings but with a cardigan over it, it's fine. It's a little too long to wear with shorter shorts, but with the right length shorts, it's cute. It is thin and even though it's loose, the top will show every bulge and love handle you may have.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Gourlay

customer_reviews.title: I find them very comfortable for summer
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these shirts in different colors. I find them very comfortable for summer. They are nice and breezy, fit loosely without looking baggy, and they add enough cover for leggings or "skinny" fitting pants/bottoms. My only complaint is that when the lighter colored shirts (blue/gray etc) gets water on them they show the marks after the water dries until you wash them again. The dark shirts (brown/black) don't have as much of this problem (perhaps because the darker color covers the marks up making them less visible).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patterned tops are Wonderful! +++ Do not order the solid colors. Yellow and red colors are flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Top! Flows and fits wonderful. I ordered pattern black and was so impressed, I went back to order to the patterned green as well as the solid yellow and Merlot red. The solid red and yellow are a much lighter fabric. The solid colors did not lay or move as well, flimsy. I returned the solid colors but I am thrilled with the patterned tops.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality~
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it fit and the swing aspect of it. It doesn't fit tightly at all but thw shoulder seams are where they need to be. It washes well and doesn't pill up as some other tunics I have purchased do. My only complaint is that the green I see on my monitor is not the green shade that showed up in my mailbox. I did not deduct any stars for this because it could be a differece because of monitor settings. It's just not as bright a green as I thought it might be.
customer_reviews.author: 808Lover

customer_reviews.title: Dances over my giant ass and still seems cute
customer_reviews.text: In my plight to own all things black instead of diet, this particular shirt is my fav. I can wear slim fit pants and this shirt dances over my fat ass in such a fun way it’s not so obvious that it’s a cover operation.
customer_reviews.author: PandaJosie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shirt
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" 285 with a long torso. (1 mth postpartum) it is so hard to find shirts that are long enough and fit without looking like I'm being swallowed by fabric or hugs my fat rolls. This is awesome, super soft fabric, perfect length, ordered 2x. I most definitely am ordering more colors in this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanetta

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles easy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nice loose shirt to hang over my baby belly. Paired nicely on its own or under a jacket. Didn’t shrink after washing but winkles beyond belief and couldn’t really be worn after. No matter ironing or throwing in the dryer, this shirt winkles so easy while being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Plus Size Belly Covering Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt! I actually bought another one in a different color because I loved it so much. I'm 5'4 280lbs. And the 3x fits perfectly even after first wash. I like shirts that cover my belly and this does in the front and the sides are longer. Highly recommend this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purple Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Purple Purchased. I bought this to have a friend put "Witch Please" on as a birthday gift for my mom (I'll have a matching one). The color is an amazing, deep purple. It looks darker than the picture, which was perfect for us. The fabric is lightweight, flowy, soft, and well-made. I can't wait to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sears

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHIRTS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are seriously the most comfortable things I have ever purchased in my life! I bought four of them and intend to buy one in every single color because I will be damned if I miss out on having enough. I wear these with Lularoe leggings and they cover my butt. I am 5'10 with extremely long legs but they cover everything I want and are still not too long. They wash well and I hang them to dry. This colors are true to the pictures and don't fade with washing. They are perfect for travel because they are almost impossible to wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: couldbutwont

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Top with a Bit of Style
customer_reviews.text: Great casual top with just enough style to keep it from being boring. It's as comfy as a t-shirt. The fabric is soft and stretchy and light enough for summer, and the fit is good through the body, including the neck and arms. The bottom is flowy but tapered enough that it's not like wearing a tent! The style is flattering. I bought to wear with printed leggings, and the length is just right: long enough to cover the backside but not so long that it looks like a dress.
customer_reviews.author: DandyLion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Im always buying and returning shirts like these, but this one fits perfect. I sized down one due to the comments. Swingy, flattering, arms fit perfect, hides the things that need hiding. Glad I bought 3 colors. Great top.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap lousy fabric
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product 6 weeks and only worn it three times. The neckline is pulling and the front is perforated with holes. There is no reason for all this to happen as I wash it by hand and lay it flat to dry.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be ordering more in other colors
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! As for sizing I'm at an awkward weight where most women mediums are a little snug but larges are a little too baggy since this was described as a "loose" fit a took a chance and ordered the medium and so glad I did. If you're almost between sizes I would suggest ordering the smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really love this shirt. I’m having to buy one for my mom. I got greenish mint color and it’s true to the Color in the picture. Will definitely buy more. Not a bad price at all. I got the XL and it fits amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: These shirts are amazing! First of all they are a and spandex ...
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are amazing! First of all they are a and spandex material so they are nice and stretchy but flow very nicely. They are not clingy which is great for me because I have a stomach that I like to keep hidden 😉 They flow down past my stomach and behind so they are great to wear with leggings! I have ordered 3 of these shirts and will more than likely order more! I ordered a size xl and it was true to size for all three of the shirts that I have ordered. If your hesitant don't be you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Lovely top.  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2", 150 lbs and a 38DD. I ordered a Large. This fit loosely, is shown on the photos like it fits in real life. I could have ordered a size smaller but I'm ok with it being loose as I can also belt it if I want. The product is well made and quality construction. It's soft and flows easily. I wear it with black leggings and a scarf. I've already washed and dried it and it held up well. I've gotten several compliments on the color and style. Thank Lammo!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Love the material!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 4x just in case the 3x would be too small (due to being big chested). I now know that the 3x wouldve been perfect, so I will be ordering me a few more in the right size! I absolutely love the material. It's not too thin and not too thick. I've washed and dried many times and the shirt is still in great condition! I would definitely encourage you to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: ☆•Ms•Ashley•☆

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort & style of this swing tunic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort & style of this swing tunic! Washes well too! “Handkerchief” hemline makes it fun! I have several in different colors & would love to have more! Goes great with jeans for a casual look, or with capris or pants for a more business casual look. Can easily be accessorized with jewelry & wedges or heels for a dressier “out to dinner” look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought more.  Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so comfortable. Very soft and cool to wear. I only downgraded it one star because the material is thin, but not so thin to make it cheap. Washes and dries in the dryer. Take out of the dryer immediately to prevent wrinkles in the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Willowbrook

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt perfect length for me
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that there are any big issues with this shirt. I would have liked a little more room in the bust & sleeves. That is just my preference. Still like it and were it often. I wash on delicate cycle and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wells

customer_reviews.title: Larace Swing Tunic Top
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" wear 36DD bra, and 10-12 pants. I am 62 years old so I want to dress stylish but age appropriate. I bought a medium which fits perfect on top. From my personal perspective, I feel it gives me a pear shape because it fits perfect around the breast but then flows outward therefore emphasizing my hips. This could just be my personal image but took a picture so you can decide. I like the feel of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these shirts. I quickly became one of my favorites. I have had issues with the hem coming out, but I keep ordering more because for the price, they are just so nice for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.author: T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: So pretty , orange is true orange, not red
customer_reviews.text: The orange shirt is bright and summery, and the fit is excellent. . I did order (2x) as it's hard to tell how shirts will fit, this one fits a bit clingish on the upper body but flares at the bottom so fits nicely over the rear. If would size up 1 size if you don't want it snug, but overall it is pretty much true to size.
customer_reviews.author: SunBurst

customer_reviews.title: Clingy
customer_reviews.text: The neck is a little wide and the fabric is very clingy (I'm even wearing a camisole underneath). It is however, stretchy and a nice length and fits my pear shaped body pretty well. After trying it on I washed it on the hand wash cycle and then tumble dried on low heat. It came out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LReinhardt

product_meta.title: LARACE Womens Swing Tunic Tops Loose Fit Comfy Flattering T Shirt
feature_bullets: Lightweight fabric with great stretch for comfort.
Figure flattering swing style short sleeve scoop neck top with handkerchief hemline.
An essential top for this summer!!! Flowy hem is long enough to cover belly and hem.

Ways to style: wear with leggings and a denim jacket for an ultra chic look. Dress it up with black slacks. Wear it as layering top in cooler seasons. Rock it as a beach coverup, sleepwear top, or maternity wear for pre, during, and post pregnancy.
